u_ai_tool.u_description: Returns whether the current time (seconds) is odd or even. A fun way to make random decisions or test if the AI tools are working.

sys_update_version.name: u_ai_tool_b5cf14b7831e32104d4fccb6feaad31c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_ai_tool"><u_ai_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_ai_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>opencode</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-14 07:18:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>b5cf14b7831e32104d4fccb6feaad31c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>odd_or_even</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI in a Box" source="0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI in a Box">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_ai_tool_b5cf14b7831e32104d4fccb6feaad31c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>opencode</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-15 00:16:01</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_description>Returns whether the current time (seconds) is odd or even. A fun way to make random decisions or test if the AI tools are working.</u_description><u_execute_in/><u_name>odd_or_even</u_name><u_parameters>{"type": "object", "properties": {}, "required": []}</u_parameters><u_script><![CDATA[(function(args, userId) {
    var now = new GlideDateTime();
    var timeStr = "" + now;
    var seconds = parseInt(timeStr.substring(17, 19), 10);
    var isEven = seconds % 2 === 0;
    return {
        seconds: seconds,
        result: isEven ? "even" : "odd",
        message: "The current second is " + seconds + ", which is " + (isEven ? "even" : "odd") + "!",
        timestamp: timeStr
    };
})(args, userId);]]></u_script></u_ai_tool></record_update>
